0.a: Yes, we offer same-day delivery for orders placed before 4:00 PM within our delivery area.

1.q: Can I schedule a delivery for a specific date and time?
1.a: Absolutely, you can select the delivery date and time slot during checkout.

2.q: What happens if the recipient is not at home?
2.a: We will contact the recipient to arrange a new delivery or leave the order in a safe place, according to your instructions.

3.q: Can I add a note or dedication to my order?
3.a: Yes, you can write a personalized dedication that we will deliver with your flowers.

4.q: What payment methods do you accept?
4.a: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and other secure online payment methods.

5.q: How can I keep my flowers fresh for longer?
5.a: We recommend cutting the stems diagonally, changing the water every two days, and avoiding direct sunlight.

6.q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
6.a: If you need to modify or cancel your order, please contact us as soon as possible. We will do our best to help you.

7.a: Yes, you can contact us to request a fully customized floral arrangement.

deliveryAreas.title: Delivery Areas
deliveryAreas.description: At Flower Power, we offer fresh flower delivery services in the following areas. If your location is not listed, please contact us to check availability.

areas.0: Madrid city and metropolitan area - Same day delivery available
areas.1: Rest of the Peninsula - Delivery within 24-48 hours
areas.2: Balearic and Canary Islands - Delivery within 48-72 hours

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
deliveryTimes.description: Our delivery times vary depending on the type of order and location. All orders are processed and prepared with the utmost care to ensure your flowers arrive fresh and beautiful.

shippingCosts.title: Shipping Costs
shippingCosts.description: Our shipping costs depend on the delivery location and the type of service selected. For orders over â‚¬60, we offer free shipping on standard deliveries within Madrid city.

specialInstructions.title: Special Instructions
specialInstructions.description: To ensure successful delivery of your flowers, please consider the following:

instructions.0: Provide a valid contact phone number for the recipient in case our delivery person needs to get in touch.
instructions.1: If delivery is to an office, please indicate the company name and department.
instructions.2: For hospital deliveries, please check in advance if they allow flowers and provide the room number.
instructions.3: If no one is available to receive the order, we will try to leave it in a safe place or with a neighbor, according to your instructions.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: At Flower Power, we collect certain personal information to enhance your shopping experience and provide you with the best possible service. The data we may collect includes:

items.0: Contact information (name, address, email, phone number)
items.1: Payment information (credit card details, billing address)
items.3: Technical information about your device and how you interact with our website

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

items.1: Managing your account and providing customer support
items.2: Personalizing your experience and offering products that may interest you
items.4: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance the functionality of our website and understand how you interact with it. You can set your browser to refuse all cookies or to alert you when a cookie is sent.

0.purpose: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site

2.purpose: Help us understand how you use our site

thirdParties.title: Sharing with Third Parties
thirdParties.description: We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances:

items.0: Service providers who help us operate our business (payment processors, delivery services)
items.1: When required by law or to protect our legal rights

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: As a user, you have certain rights regarding your personal data:

items.0: Right to access your personal data
items.2: Right to erasure of your data ('right to be forgotten')
items.3: Right to restrict processing of your data

privacyPage.contact: To exercise any of these rights or if you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at privacy{at}flowerpower.com

generalCare.title: General Care
generalCare.description: To keep your flowers fresh and beautiful for as long as possible, follow these basic care tips:

tips.0: Cut the stems diagonally about 2-3 cm every 2-3 days with clean, sharp scissors
tips.1: Change the water in your vase every 2 days with fresh room temperature water
tips.2: Keep flowers away from direct sunlight, heat sources, and drafts
tips.3: Remove any leaves that would be submerged in water to prevent bacterial growth
tips.4: Remove wilted flowers to extend the life of the rest of the bouquet

wateringGuide.title: Watering Guide
wateringGuide.description: Different types of flowers have different water needs. Here's a quick guide:

seasonalCare.title: Seasonal Care
seasonalCare.description: Environmental conditions vary by season, which affects the care your flowers need:

0.name: Spring
0.description: With moderate temperatures, it's the ideal season for flowers. However, allergies can be an issue.

tips.0: Keep flowers in well-ventilated rooms but away from direct drafts
tips.1: Avoid placing them near open windows where pollen can enter

1.name: Summer
1.description: Heat can significantly shorten the life of your flowers if precautions aren't taken.

tips.0: Keep flowers in the coolest rooms of the house, away from direct sunlight
tips.1: Consider adding ice cubes to the vase water on particularly hot days

2.name: Autumn
2.description: Variable temperatures can affect the longevity of flowers.

tips.0: Avoid placing flowers near heating systems that are starting to operate
tips.1: Protect bouquets from cold drafts that may come through windows and doors

3.name: Winter
3.description: Indoor heating can quickly dehydrate your flowers.

tips.0: Keep flowers away from radiators, heaters, and other direct heat sources
tips.1: Consider using a humidifier in the room where you keep your flowers

commonProblems.title: Common Problems
commonProblems.description: Here you'll find solutions to the most frequent problems with flower bouquets:

0.solution: Make sure to change the water regularly, cut the stems, and keep flowers away from heat and direct sunlight. You can also add a floral preservative to the water.

1.solution: Change the water immediately, clean the vase thoroughly with soap and hot water, trim the stems, and remove any leaves or petals that might be in the water.

2.solution: This usually indicates bacterial rot. Remove affected flowers, trim healthy stems above the damaged part, and completely change the vase water.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Do you have any questions or comments? We're here to help. Get in touch with us and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subject: Subject
form.privacyPolicyText: I have read and accept the
form.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

0.question: How long will it take to receive a response?
0.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24-48 business hours.

1.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
1.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your order as long as it hasn't been processed. Contact us as soon as possible.

2.question: Do you ship internationally?
2.answer: Yes, we ship to several European countries. Delivery times and costs vary depending on the destination.

3.question: Do you offer custom floral arrangements?
3.answer: Absolutely, we can create custom floral arrangements according to your preferences. Contact us for more details.

physicalStore.title: Our Flower Power Physical Store
physicalStore.description: In our physical store, you can feel, smell, and see our flowers or plants in person. We will be delighted to welcome you so that you can get to know us and we can share our passion for the world of flowers and plants.

schedule.title: Opening Hours
schedule.weekdays: Find us Monday to Friday, from 10 AM to 8 PM.

workshops.title: Online Workshops
workshops.description: Access our YouTube channel where you can see how we create our bouquets.

location.title: Carrer Fetjet, 3
location.visit: Visit us, we will be delighted to assist you.

introduction.p1: Welcome to Flower Power. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and acknowledge that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.
introduction.p2: If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.p1: These Terms of Use constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Flower Power regarding your use of our website. By using our site, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms.
acceptance.p2: If you are using our site on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity to these Terms of Use.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.p1: Flower Power reserves the right to revise these Terms of Use at any time without notice. By using this website, you agree to be bound by the current version of these Terms of Use. We recommend that you periodically review these terms to stay informed of any changes.

siteUsage.title: Site Usage
siteUsage.p1: Permission to use this website is granted under the following conditions:

list.item1: The information on this site may not be used for commercial purposes without the express permission of Flower Power.
list.item2: You may not modify or copy the materials on this site except for personal, non-commercial use.
list.item3: You may not attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the Flower Power website.
list.item4: You may not remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials.
list.item5: You may not transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.

siteUsage.p2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Flower Power at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.p1: When you create an account on our site, you must provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account.
userAccounts.p2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for restricting access to your computer or device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. Flower Power reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, remove or edit content, or cancel orders in its sole discretion.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.p1: This website and all its content, features, and functionality (including but not limited to all information, software, text, images, logos, audio and video, and the design, selection, and arrangement thereof), are owned by Flower Power, its licensors, or other providers of such material and are protected by Spanish and international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.
intellectualProperty.p2: These Terms of Use permit you to use the website for your personal, non-commercial use only. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on our website, except as permitted in these Terms of Use.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.p1: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Flower Power. Flower Power has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. We do not warrant or endorse any offers from these third parties. You acknowledge and agree that Flower Power shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: The materials on Flower Power's website are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. Flower Power makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
liability.p2: Further, Flower Power does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.p1: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us through our

introduction.p1: These Terms of Sale govern the purchase of products through the Flower Power website. By placing an order through our site, you agree to be bound by these terms.
introduction.p2: We recommend that you read these terms carefully before placing any order. If you do not agree with these terms, you should not use our site to make purchases.

products.title: Products
products.p1: All products displayed on our website are subject to availability. We reserve the right to discontinue any product at any time.
products.p2: We make every effort to accurately display the colors and images of our products. However, we cannot guarantee that the display of colors on your device will be accurate.

prices.title: Prices
prices.p1: All prices displayed on our website include VAT (Value Added Tax) at the current rate. Prices are subject to change without notice.
prices.p2: Shipping costs are shown separately and added to the total price during the checkout process.

orders.title: Orders
orders.p1: When you place an order through our website, you are making an offer to purchase the selected products in accordance with these Terms of Sale.
orders.p2: We reserve the right to refuse any order placed through our website. In the event that we refuse your order, we will attempt to notify you as soon as possible.

payment.title: Payment
payment.p1: We accept the following payment methods:

list.item1: Credit/debit cards: Visa, MasterCard, American Express

payment.p2: Payment will be processed once you have completed your order. You will not be charged until we confirm that we can fulfill your order.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.p1: We offer shipping to mainland Spain, the Balearic Islands, the Canary Islands, Ceuta and Melilla, as well as several European countries. Delivery times vary depending on location.
shipping.p2: For orders within mainland Spain, the estimated delivery time is 24-48 business hours from order confirmation. For other destinations, delivery times may vary.
shipping.p3: Please note that delivery times are estimates and are not guaranteed. We are not responsible for delays caused by circumstances beyond our control.

cancellations.title: Cancellations
cancellations.p1: You may cancel your order before it has been processed for shipping. Once the order has been processed, it cannot be canceled.
cancellations.p2: To cancel an order, please contact us as soon as possible through our contact page or by phone.

returns.title: Returns
returns.p1: You have the right to return products purchased within 14 calendar days of receipt without giving any reason, in accordance with distance selling regulations.
returns.p2: To exercise your right of return, you must inform us of your decision by means of an unequivocal statement (e.g., a letter sent by post, fax, or email).
returns.p3: Products must be returned in their original condition, unused, and with all original packaging. Return costs will be at your expense. We will refund all payments received, including shipping costs (except for any additional costs resulting from your choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by us).

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.p1: All our products are covered by the legal warranty established in Spanish legislation. This warranty covers defects of conformity that manifest within two years from the delivery of the product.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.p1: If you have any complaint or claim about a product or service, please contact us through our contact page. We will do our best to resolve any issues quickly and satisfactorily.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.p1: These Terms of Sale are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain. Any dispute arising in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Spanish courts.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Sale, please contact us through our

introduction.p1: At Flower Power, we use cookies to improve your browsing experience, display personalized content, and analyze traffic to our website. This page allows you to manage your cookie preferences.
introduction.p2: By continuing to browse our website, you accept the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files that websites place on your device to store information. These cookies can be our own (managed by Flower Power) or third-party (managed by other companies on our behalf).

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.p1: We use different types of cookies on our website:

technical.title: Technical Cookies (necessary)
technical.description: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website and allow you to navigate and use its features, such as accessing secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made (such as your username, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. They allow us to improve how the website works.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third-party advertisers.

manageCookies.title: Cookie Settings
manageCookies.p1: You can adjust your cookie preferences below. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect your experience on our website.

panel.title: Cookie Preferences
panel.preferencesDescription: Allow remembering your preferences and personalizing your experience.
panel.analyticsDescription: Help us improve our website by analyzing how you use it.
panel.marketingDescription: Allow personalized advertising on our site and other websites.

deleteCookies.title: How to Delete Cookies
deleteCookies.p1: You can delete cookies stored on your device at any time through your browser settings. Here's how to do it in the most popular browsers:

browsers.chrome: Google Chrome: Menu > Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data > See all cookies and site data
browsers.firefox: Mozilla Firefox: Menu > Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data > Manage Data
browsers.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
browsers.edge: Microsoft Edge: Menu > Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Manage and delete cookies and site data

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.p1: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We recommend that you review this page periodically to stay informed of any changes. The date of the last update is shown at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us through our

teamSection.title: A team of florists ready to work for you
teamSection.paragraph1: We love flowers, plants, and design, which is why we decided to create Flower Power florist to transmit our passion and offer quality to our customers.
teamSection.paragraph2: We are a florist located in Mallorca, prioritizing design and quality above all else. That's why we work with a network of collaborators at the national level to ensure flowers reach you in less than 24 hours at the destination you specify. We personally select the best florists in each municipality, city, and/or province. We also ship internationally, where we are advancing to offer our quality seal to the largest number of countries possible. Currently, it's already possible in Germany, the United Kingdom, and Russia.

historySection.title: History
historySection.paragraph1: Our first flower shop was called El ArrayÃ¡n and was born in 1996 in the city of CÃ³rdoba, Spain. After 5 years of service, for family reasons, we moved to the island of Mallorca and decided to change the name to something more international and more in line with the island of Mallorca, where there is a lot of foreign tourism. Since 2000 until now, we have had the opportunity to grow and gain the necessary experience to start focusing on the online business and reach more customers.

founderSection.title: Who am I?
founderSection.paragraph1: My name is Antonia Maqueda and I am the founder of Flower Power. I am the person in charge of directing this company, and it makes me extremely happy that you are on our website. My passion is flowers, and my goal is for my clients to receive the best possible quality. We make each bouquet artisanally and unique so that the person who gives or treats themselves feels what we feel when we create something unique and special, which is a good floral composition.
founderSection.paragraph2: I invite you to subscribe to our newsletter below to get to know us better, receive discounts, offers, and the latest news from Flower Power.
founderSection.signature:
Thank you for visiting,
Antonia Maqueda
founderSection.imageAlt: Antonia Maqueda, founder of Flower Power

0.title: Quality
0.description: We carefully select each flower and plant to ensure maximum freshness and beauty in all our arrangements.

1.title: Creativity
1.description: Each floral composition is unique, designed with passion and creativity to convey emotions and feelings.

2.title: Commitment
2.description: We are committed to providing exceptional service, delivering on time, and taking care of every detail to exceed your expectations.
